import React from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = () => { const match = useParams() const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 3 ? 'In Stock' : product.countInStock <= 3 ? 'Limited Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
